__TOC__



Contributions of any kind are greatly appreciated! 

We may use the donations as we see fit or pass them on to others. Potential Recipients: 
* Related Groups
** <nowiki>[[http://www.coreboot.org/|Coreboot]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://www.opengraphics.org/|Open Graphics]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://xiph.org/|Xiph Foundation]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://www.fsf.org/|Free software Foundation]]</nowiki>
* Needy
** Low-income Schools
** Elderly

== Hardware ==
If you have hardware (computers, parts, components, etc) that you would like to donate we would love to adopt it. We may fix it up with Ubuntu and the appropriate software and settings and give them to deserving recipients or we may donate it to related groups. 

== Money ==
Money will be used to fund team evens or projects. 

== Other ==
Please let us know if there is any other way you would like to support us. 

== Contact ==
If you wish to donate, please contact one of the following people: 
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~doctormo|Martin Owens]]</nowiki>
